skill.name: frontend-design
skill.description: Create distinctive, production-grade frontend interfaces with high design quality. Use this skill when the user asks to build web components, pages, artifacts, posters, or applications (examples include websites, landing pages, dashboards, React components, HTML/CSS layouts, or when styling/beautifying any web UI). Generates creative, polished code and UI design that avoids generic AI aesthetics.
skill.summary: Create distinctive, production-grade frontend interfaces with high design quality. Use this skill wh...
skill.author: unknown

security_audit.summary: Official Anthropic skill; minimal audit performed. The content is guidance for frontend design and coding. No risky behaviors are present.

content.user_title: Create bold frontend interfaces with clear direction
content.value_statement: You need a frontend layout that looks distinctive and professional. This skill guides a bold design direction and produces production ready UI code.
actual_capabilities: Frame a bold aesthetic direction before coding
Generate production grade HTML, CSS, and JavaScript UI
Provide guidance for React or Vue interface code
Apply typography and color system guidance with CSS variables
Suggest motion and layout techniques for memorable UIs
limitations: Does not run builds or render previews
Does not source external images or fonts
Relies on user provided requirements and constraints
Does not perform user research or usability testing

use_cases.title: Concept landing page
use_cases.description: Create a bold marketing page concept with clear visual direction and layout guidance.

use_cases.title: Styled component build
use_cases.description: Generate production grade HTML and CSS for a distinctive component or section.

use_cases.title: Pitch site refresh
use_cases.description: Define an aesthetic direction and deliver a refined interface plan for a new homepage.

prompt_templates.title: Basic layout
prompt_templates.prompt: Design a simple landing page layout for a note taking app. Provide HTML and CSS with clear typography and spacing.

prompt_templates.title: Brand direction
prompt_templates.prompt: Create a bold visual direction for a fintech dashboard. Provide a layout plan and a color and typography system.

prompt_templates.title: Animated hero
prompt_templates.prompt: Design a hero section with a dramatic background and staggered load animation. Provide HTML, CSS, and motion details.

prompt_templates.title: Full page build
prompt_templates.prompt: Build a complete responsive homepage for a creative agency. Use a distinctive aesthetic and provide production ready HTML and CSS.

output_examples.input: Design a luxury watch landing page with a bold, editorial feel
output: A clear editorial grid with oversized headings and refined body copy
A deep black and gold palette with one sharp accent color
A hero section with layered imagery and subtle grain texture
A staggered page load animation for headlines and call to action

best_practices: Define a single clear aesthetic direction before coding
Use a small, consistent palette with CSS variables
Match layout complexity to the chosen visual style
anti_patterns: Using default system fonts without a design reason
Applying generic purple gradients on white backgrounds
Adding scattered micro interactions without a hero moment

faq.question: Is this compatible with React and Vue?
faq.answer: Yes. It provides guidance that can be expressed in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, or Vue.

faq.question: What limits should I expect?
faq.answer: It does not run builds, fetch assets, or validate designs with users.

faq.question: Can I integrate with an existing design system?
faq.answer: Yes, if you provide system tokens and component constraints.

faq.question: How is my data handled?
faq.answer: The skill uses your prompt content only for generation and does not store data.

faq.question: What if the output looks too generic?
faq.answer: Provide a stronger aesthetic direction, reference visuals, and list specific constraints.

faq.question: How does it compare to general coding assistants?
faq.answer: It focuses on bold visual direction and detailed UI aesthetics rather than generic layout code.
